name: Salsa-Virtual
description: Salsa Virtual teaches you salsa partner dancing with virtual reality. Learn the basics in the comfort and convenience of your own home, and be ready to hit the floor dancing when you try it in the real world.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 3 GB available space
